reviewtext: When Linksys products work, they are wonderful, however, their customer tech support is EXTREMELY difficult to use!Linksys tech support is a MAZE of phone calls, robot voices,etc!You get switched to different level, the PeterPrincipal being VERY evident as you slog along trying to even understand what they are saying!I've owned 4 different Linksys products over a 5yr time frame, ONE of the products worked for 2yrs, that's a record with Linksys, the rest DIED and were thrown in the trash within months!Linksys, not worth ALL the bother!
